1.title: "Newspaper Comic Artists Remembered"
1.author: Hank Ketcham
notes: Shows Ketcham's painted portraits, with his commentary, of Frank King, George Herriman, Cliff Sterrett, H.T. Webster, Winsor McCay, Harold Gray, Alex Raymond, Chic Young, Billy DeBeck, Max Fleischer, Dr. Seuss, and George McManus. Cover of issue shows his painting of Percy Crosby.

3.heading: Newspaper Comic Strips.
3.title: The Blank in the Comics Strip Collection.
3.author: [No author]
notes: Clipped American newspaper comic strips arranged by themes, topics and key words, kept in business size (no. 10) envelopes. Collecting began in 1981, with some earlier additions.
There were 10,632 separate envelopes/topics as of Summer 1995. Each envelope is listed separately in the present index.
Collected and arranged by Randall W. Scott.
